original_text: and that if anyone did not come within three days, by order of the officials and the elders all his property should be forfeited, and he himself banned from the congregation of the exiles.
korean_text: 누구든지 방백들과 장로들의 훈시를 따라 삼일 내에 오지 아니하면 그의 재산을 적몰하고 사로잡혔던 자의 모임에서 쫓아내리라 하매

sentences.original_text: and that if anyone did not come within three days,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 누구든지 사흘 안에 오지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: by order of the officials and the elders
all his property should be forfeited,
and he himself banned from the congregation of the exiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자신도 포로들의 모임에서 추방되어야 하리라.
